ImageSource.TagOrganizer Class Reference

The SourceImageOrganizer is used to add, remove and modify images in the ImageSource program. This class maintains a list of all SourceImage objects, and calls the SourceImageFactory as necessary to change the values of the reference file. This is a singleton class, and must be accessed using the getInstance() method. More...

 Returns the single instance of the TagOrganizer in the running program. Example: 

            //get the instance

Detailed Description

The SourceImageOrganizer is used to add, remove and modify images in the ImageSource program. This class maintains a list of all SourceImage objects, and calls the SourceImageFactory as necessary to change the values of the reference file. This is a singleton class, and must be accessed using the getInstance() method.

This class is used to gain the functionality of the SourceImageFactory class.

Member Function Documentation

void ImageSource.TagOrganizer.addTag ( string  imageName,
string  tagType,
object  newValue 
)

Adds a new Tag to the system, and calls TagFactory to add it to the reference file.

Parameters:
imageNameThe full name of the image, including file extension, that the Tag object should be added to.
newValueThe value of the Tag object to be created.
tagTypeThe TagType of the Tag object to be created.
void ImageSource.TagOrganizer.addTagType ( string  name,
int  dataType 
)

Adds a new TagType to the system, and calls TagFactory to add it to the reference file.

Parameters:
nameThe name of the TagType to be created.
dataTypeThe datatype of the TagType to be created.
void ImageSource.TagOrganizer.changeTag ( string  imageName,
string  tagType,
object  newValue 
)

Changes the value of a Tag in the system.

Parameters:
imageNameThe name of the image the Tag is applied to.
tagTypeThe TagType of the Tag to be modified.
newValueThe new value of the Tag to be modified.
void ImageSource.TagOrganizer.changeTagType ( string  name,
int  newDataType 
)

Changes the datatype of an existing TagType object, and calls TagFactory to make the change to the reference file.

Any existing tags will remain, however their values will be set to the default minimum.

Parameters:
nameThe name of the TagType to be modified.
newDataTypeThe new datatype of the TagType to be modified.
static TagOrganizer ImageSource.TagOrganizer.getInstance (  ) [static]

Returns the single instance of the TagOrganizer in the running program. Example: 

            //get the instance
            TagOrganizer tagOrganizer = TagOrganizer.getInstance();.

//the same organizer object can now be used to access the tags from //any class which has retrieved an instance.

Returns:
The current TagOrganizer instance.
ArrayList ImageSource.TagOrganizer.getTagList ( string  imageName )

This is used to obtain a list of all Tag objects loaded into the system.

Returns:
Returns an ArrayList created from a <![CDATA[KeyValuePair<string name, Tag tag>]]> object, where "name" is name of the tag.TagType object, and "tag" is the Tag object.
ArrayList ImageSource.TagOrganizer.getTagTypeList (  )

This is used to obtain a list of all TagType objects loaded into the system.

Returns:
Returns an ArrayList created from a <![CDATA[KeyValuePair<string name, TagType tagType>]]> object, where "name" is name of the TagType, and "tagType" is the TagType object.
void ImageSource.TagOrganizer.removeAllTags ( string  imageName )

Removes all Tag objects from the specified image.

Parameters:
imageNameThe full name of the image, including file extension, to be removed.
void ImageSource.TagOrganizer.removeTag ( string  imageName,
Tag  tag 
)

Removes the specified TagType from the system, and then calls TagFactory to remove the TagType from the reference file.

This will remove all Tags of this TagType from any images which have them applied.

Parameters:
imageNameThe full name of the image, including file extension, of the image to remove the Tag from.
tagThe Tag object to be removed from the system.
void ImageSource.TagOrganizer.removeTagType ( string  tagType )

Removes the specified TagType from the system, and then calls TagFactory to remove the TagType from the reference file.

This will remove all Tags of this TagType from any images which have them applied.

Parameters:
tagTypeThe TagType to be removed.
ArrayList ImageSource.TagOrganizer.sortTags ( TagType  type,
string  searchPattern 
)

Returns a list of all images which have a Tag of TagType.dataType Constants.DATATYPE_STRING, whose value contains the specified search string.

Parameters:
typeThe TagType of the Tag to be searched for.
searchPatternThe string to be searched for.
Returns:
The ArrayList of images in <![CDATA[KeyValuePair<string name, SourceImage image>]]> format that match the search criteria.
ArrayList ImageSource.TagOrganizer.sortTags ( TagType  type,
DateTime  lowerBound,
DateTime  upperBound 
)

Returns a list of all images which have a Tag of TagType.dataType Constants.DATATYPE_DATE, whose value, on the interval [lowerBound, upperBound].

Parameters:
typeThe TagType of the Tag to be searched for.
lowerBoundThe lower boundary on the search.
upperBoundThe upper boundary on the search.
Returns:
The ArrayList of images in <![CDATA[KeyValuePair<string name, SourceImage image>]]> format that match the search criteria.
